# Copilot Instructions

- **Project shape:** Single-page Vite + React + TypeScript portfolio; the root layout stitches section components (hero, about, expertise, experience, projects, certifications, contact) and the animated starfield background in [src/App.tsx](src/App.tsx#L13-L36).
- **Dev commands:** Use `npm install` then `npm run dev` for local serve, `npm run build` for production, `npm run preview` to inspect the build, and `npm run lint` for ESLint ([package.json](package.json#L1-L36)).
- **Routing & scroll:** Navigation relies on `react-scroll`; header links target section IDs. When adding sections, keep IDs in sync with nav definitions in [src/components/Header.tsx](src/components/Header.tsx#L25-L177) and the target `id` attributes in each section component.
- **Styling system:** Tailwind with a few helper classes defined in [src/index.css](src/index.css#L1-L32); prefer these utilities over custom CSS when possible. The fixed starfield overlay comes from [src/starry-background.css](src/starry-background.css#L1-L73) and is imported once in App.
- **Visual language:** Hero and section headings use Framer Motion `motion.*` wrappers for entrance animations (e.g., [src/components/HeroSection.tsx](src/components/HeroSection.tsx#L17-L70), [src/components/AboutSection.tsx](src/components/AboutSection.tsx#L19-L55)). Maintain consistent durations/offsets when adding animations.
- **Data-driven content:** Lists render from typed data modules under `src/data`. Update these files to change displayed content and keep shapes intact (projects, internships, certifications, skills) ([src/data/projectsData.ts](src/data/projectsData.ts#L1-L90), [src/data/internshipsData.ts](src/data/internshipsData.ts#L1-L120), [src/data/certificationsData.ts](src/data/certificationsData.ts#L1-L22), [src/data/skillsData.ts](src/data/skillsData.ts#L1-L6)).
- **Projects grid:** Cards pull titles/tech/media from `projectsData` and render CTA buttons for repo/live links in [src/components/ProjectsSection.tsx](src/components/ProjectsSection.tsx#L1-L120); include `techStack` labels and optional `liveLink` for new entries.
- **Experience cards:** Internships/experience cards map responsibilities and tech tags from `internshipsData` in [src/components/InternshipsSection.tsx](src/components/InternshipsSection.tsx#L1-L118); provide short bullet strings and logos (URLs accepted).
- **Certifications modal:** Clicking a certification opens a simple modal showing the full image ([src/components/CertificationsSection.tsx](src/components/CertificationsSection.tsx#L7-L98)). Supply `imageUrl` pointing to local assets under `src/assets` or remote URLs.
- **Hero assets:** The hero uses a local profile image and downloadable resume PDF ([src/components/HeroSection.tsx](src/components/HeroSection.tsx#L35-L78)); place replacements in `src/assets/` and `src/resume/` and update the imports.
- **Contact form:** Form posts JSON to Formspree at `FORMSPREE_ENDPOINT`; success/error toasts are handled with `react-toastify` in [src/components/ContactSection.tsx](src/components/ContactSection.tsx#L22-L190). Update the endpoint or add fields here; preserve the `isSubmitting` guard and toast feedback.
- **Buttons & typography:** Shared button styles (`btn-primary`, `btn-outline`) and section headings (`section-title`) come from the Tailwind component layer in [src/index.css](src/index.css#L20-L31); reuse them for consistency.
- **Theming:** Tailwind theme extensions (brand colors, fonts, scale helpers) live in [tailwind.config.js](tailwind.config.js#L1-L27); lean on these tokens before introducing new hex values.
- **Backgrounds:** Body background image and fixed attachment are set globally in [src/index.css](src/index.css#L11-L18). Keep background changes centralized there to avoid layering conflicts with the starfield.
- **Imports & assets:** Components expect static assets in `src/assets/` and PDFs in `src/resume/`; reference via ES module imports so Vite bundles them correctly.
- **Accessibility & links:** Social/profile links appear in the header/footer ([src/components/Header.tsx](src/components/Header.tsx#L74-L177), [src/components/Footer.tsx](src/components/Footer.tsx#L1-L34)); maintain `aria-label` on icons and `rel="noopener noreferrer"` on external anchors.
- **Animation load:** Heavy backgrounds (starfield) are fixed and behind content; keep new effects lightweight and avoid `position: fixed` layers that outrank the `#star-container` z-index in App.
